summaryLong: GASAG AG issued a gas disconnection bill (Sperrrechnung) to Michael Amoabeng for the supply point at Einbecker Str. 52, V 1 L, 10315 Berlin, covering 05.02.2025–29.08.2025. The invoice (no. 700022055286) is dated 03.09.2025 and shows total gross charges of €2,141.63 for 17,705 kWh over 206 days under tariff ERDGAS Komfort, less €1,218.00 in advance payments and a separate payment of €59.10, leaving €864.53 due. Payment must be made by 19.09.2025 via bank transfer to GASAG’s HypoVereinsbank account using Vertragskontonummer 200101719866 as the reference. This is a disconnection-related invoice; non-payment leads to the claim being handed to a debt collection agency. Reconnection is conditional on full settlement of all outstanding amounts plus network/operator reconnection fees and a successful functional check of the customer installation by a certified contractor (Vertragsinstallationsunternehmen), with written confirmation and, where required, the presence of an NBB representative. GASAG lists service and complaint channels (phone, portal, email, post) and provides information about your rights, including escalation to the Schlichtungsstelle Energie if issues remain unresolved after contacting GASAG. The invoice explains meter reading and estimation rules under EnWG §40a(2) and offers an option to submit a current meter reading within 14 days for a revised bill. The document includes identifiers (Marktlokations-ID 50055327389, Messlokations-ID DE7000…217243) and device data (Balgengaszähler G4, Zählernummer 7AMX2103772341). It also discloses CO2 cost components per BEHG/EBeV and provides addresses and working hours for service.
explanationDetailed: Document type and purpose: This is a GASAG gas disconnection bill for a past consumption period. It settles charges and sets conditions for reconnection. Amounts and consumption: The total gross charges are €2,141.63 for 17,705 kWh. After subtracting advance and other payments, €864.53 remains due. Payment method and reference: Pay by bank transfer to the stated IBAN/BIC and include the contractual account number 200101719866 as reference so the payment posts correctly. Due date: 19.09.2025. Disconnection and reconnection: Supply remains blocked until you pay all amounts and pass a functional check of your installation. A certified installer must confirm the installation is technically sound; additional reconnection costs apply per NBB’s conditions. Optional meter reading: If you want billing based on an actual reading instead of estimated values, you can submit a current reading within 14 days of the invoice date; GASAG will issue a corrected bill. Support and complaints: Contact GASAG via phone, portal, email, post, or the customer center. If no satisfactory solution is reached, you can apply to the Schlichtungsstelle Energie for mediation. Legal references: The document cites EnWG §§36 and 40a, NDAV §18, CO2KostAufG §3, and BEHG/EBeV rules for CO2 costs.
risksAndConsequences: If you miss the 19.09.2025 payment deadline, GASAG will transfer the claim to a debt collection agency. Gas supply remains blocked until you pay all amounts and complete the required functional check; reconnection and inspection costs apply and are payable by you to the installer and/or network operator.
